铇字的基本解释

铇
（鉋）
bào
同“刨2”。

铇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bào］
［《廣韻》防教切，去效，並。］
“铇1”的繁体字。
(1)木工刨平木材的用具。
(2)指用刨子、刨床或其他日用刨具刮平或削去木枓、钢料等。后作“刨”。
(3)通“剥”。
[②]［páo］
［《廣韻》薄交切，平肴，並。］
“刨1”的古字。“铇2”的繁体字。
挖掘。后作“刨”。

铇字的康熙字典解释
铇字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
铇字的起名意思

暂无。

铇
Basic explanation of words
铇
(plane)
bào
Same as "Plane 2".
铇
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bào］
["Guangyun" guards against teaching cuts, eliminates effects, and merges. ]
Traditional characters for "铇1".
(1) Carpenter's tool for planing wood.
(2) Refers to the use of planers, planers or other daily-use planers to flatten or cut off wood slabs, steel materials, etc. Later as "planing".
(3) Through "stripping".
[②]［páo］
["Guangyun" thin cross-cutting, flat dishes, and. ]
The ancient word for "planing 1". Traditional characters for "铇2".
Dig. Later as "planing".
铇
